follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Swelling, shortness of breath, decreased urine output
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure daily, weigh yourself daily

dietary_restrictions: Low protein diet, limit phosphorus intake
follow_up: Primary care in 1 week, Nephrology in 3 weeks
warning_signs: Nausea, vomiting, confusion, decreased urination
discharge_instructions: Stay hydrated, avoid NSAIDs, monitor urine output

follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 1 week for dialysis planning
warning_signs: Severe fatigue, bone pain, muscle weakness
discharge_instructions: Prepare for dialysis access surgery, avoid high potassium foods

dietary_restrictions: Low sodium diet, moderate protein intake
follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Increased swelling, weight gain >2lbs/day, infection signs
discharge_instructions: Daily weights, monitor for infections, gradual steroid taper

dietary_restrictions: Diabetic diet, protein restriction, low sodium
follow_up: Endocrinology in 2 weeks, Nephrology in 1 month
warning_signs: Blood sugar >300 or <70, swelling, vision changes
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood glucose 4x daily, check feet daily

dietary_restrictions: Adequate fluid intake, low sodium diet
follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 6 weeks
warning_signs: Severe flank pain, fever, blood in urine
discharge_instructions: Avoid contact sports, maintain hydration

follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Dark urine, facial swelling, high blood pressure
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure, avoid live vaccines

follow_up: Primary care in 3 months, annual nephrology follow-up
warning_signs: Persistent fatigue, swelling, changes in urination
discharge_instructions: Regular exercise, maintain healthy weight

dietary_restrictions: Increase fluid intake, limit sodium and oxalate
follow_up: Urology in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Severe flank pain, fever, inability to urinate
discharge_instructions: Drink 3-4 liters water daily, strain urine for stones

follow_up: Cardiology in 2 weeks, Nephrology in 1 month
warning_signs: Blood pressure >180/110, chest pain, severe headache
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure twice daily, medication compliance

dietary_restrictions: Fluid restriction based on urine output
follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 1 week
warning_signs: Decreased urine output, swelling, confusion
discharge_instructions: Monitor urine output, daily weights

follow_up: Rheumatology in 2 weeks, Nephrology in 3 weeks
warning_signs: Joint pain flare, rash, fever, dark urine
discharge_instructions: Sun protection, infection precautions, regular lab monitoring

dietary_restrictions: Low sodium diet, omega-3 rich foods
follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 6 weeks
warning_signs: Blood in urine, swelling, high blood pressure
discharge_instructions: Avoid NSAIDs, monitor blood pressure

follow_up: Dialysis center orientation next week, Nephrology in 3 days
warning_signs: Severe nausea, confusion, difficulty breathing
discharge_instructions: Protect dialysis access site, low phosphorus diet

dietary_restrictions: Low sodium diet, adequate protein intake
follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Severe swelling, weight gain, infection signs
discharge_instructions: Daily weights, infection prevention, steroid side effect monitoring

follow_up: Vascular surgery in 1 week, Nephrology in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Severe hypertension, decreased urine output, leg pain
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure, avoid smoking

dietary_restrictions: Low sodium diet, moderate protein restriction
follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Severe swelling, weight gain, signs of infection
discharge_instructions: Daily weights, immunosuppression precautions

follow_up: Nephrology clinic in 3 weeks
warning_signs: Blood clots, severe swelling, infection signs
discharge_instructions: Thrombosis prevention, infection monitoring

follow_up: Nephrology in 3 months, Audiology in 6 months
warning_signs: Hearing loss progression, blood in urine, vision changes
discharge_instructions: Genetic counseling, regular hearing tests

follow_up: Nephrology in 1 week, Pulmonology in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Coughing blood, shortness of breath, chest pain
discharge_instructions: Avoid smoking, infection prevention, lung function monitoring

follow_up: Nephrology in 1 week, Hematology in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Severe fatigue, pale skin, decreased urination
discharge_instructions: Food safety, monitor for anemia signs

primary_diagnosis: Thrombotic Thrombocytopenic Purpura with Kidney Involvement
follow_up: Hematology in 1 week, Nephrology in 2 weeks
warning_signs: Bruising, confusion, fever, decreased urination
discharge_instructions: Monitor for bleeding, neurological changes

follow_up: Primary care in 1 week, Nephrology if no improvement
warning_signs: Decreased urination, swelling, nausea
discharge_instructions: Increase fluid intake, avoid further contrast studies

follow_up: Nephrology in 1 week
warning_signs: Dark urine, muscle pain, weakness
discharge_instructions: Gradual return to exercise, stay hydrated

primary_diagnosis: Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 3 with Anemia
follow_up: Nephrology in 4 weeks
warning_signs: Severe fatigue, shortness of breath, chest pain
discharge_instructions: Monitor hemoglobin levels, iron supplementation

follow_up: Transplant clinic in 2 days
warning_signs: Fever, decreased urine output, transplant site pain
discharge_instructions: Strict medication compliance, infection prevention

primary_diagnosis: Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 4 with Bone Disease
follow_up: Nephrology in 2 weeks, Endocrinology in 1 month
warning_signs: Bone pain, muscle weakness, fractures
discharge_instructions: Phosphorus restriction, calcium supplementation
